description.description: The description of the project. This description will be displayed to all users of the project. We recommend providing a brief description of the project and its intended purpose.

displayName.description:
The friendly name of the project that will be displayed to users.

The following arguments are optional:

name.description: The name of the project in the space.

The friendly name of the project that will be displayed to users.

The following arguments are optional:
